text:
It's a good day when visual poetry of the physical, numbered & signed variety gets delivered to your doorstep! 

Excited about 'Interlude' by @altgnon ‚Äî a new collection exploring themes of legibility and memory! Very much my jam! 

Thank you for the gorgeous missive! üñ§ ü§ç ‚ú®
